alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Grady; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 5:50PM CDT until April 19 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Grady County in central Oklahoma... Western Oklahoma County in central Oklahoma... Southeastern Canadian County in central Oklahoma... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 549 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Minco, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oklahoma City, El Reno, Yukon, Bethany, Mustang, Warr Acres, The Village, Tuttle, Piedmont, Nichols Hills, Union City, Minco, Forest Park, Woodlawn Park, and Richland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area.
